title: 126: Bachelor Recap: Episode 10 (Pilot Pete & The Women YELL All)
itunes:title: 126: Bachelor Recap: Episode 10 (Pilot Pete & The Women YELL All)
description:
Well, Broads, thankfully there is more to cover in this episode than just the WTA because it sure was hard to distinguish what was being said over all that yelling. The Broads chat about our new Bachelorette for a moment (will be fully covered in the next episode) and spill some CH and producer tea (3:00), they chat about the latest rose ceremony and their confusion (23:00), and then dive into the Women YELL all (54:00), and much more.
Follow along on instagram at @chattybroads 
BEKAH: @bekah
JESS: @thebaddmom
Check out our latest merch: https://www.teepublic.com/stores/chattybroads?ref_id=9106

*** DHM DETOX: Go to DHMdetox.com and use promo code "CHATTY” at checkout for 20% off your order!
